text: {{Infobox settlement | name = San Martín Region | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Bandera San Martín.png | flag_alt = | image_seal = Escudo Región San Martín.png | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Peru - San Martín Department (locator map).svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of the San Martín Region in Peru | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Peru | subdivision_type1 = Subdivisions | subdivision_name1 = 10 provinces and 77 districts | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = Largest city | subdivision_name3 = Tarapoto | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Moyobamba | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Pedro Bogarín Vargas (2019–2022) | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 51253.31 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = (Capital) | elevation_m = | elevation_max_m = 3080 | elevation_min_m = 190 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 813381 | population_as_of = 2017 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = UBIGEO | postal_code = 22 | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = 042 | iso_code = PE-SAM | website = www.regionsanmartin.gob.pe | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = Principal resources | blank_info_sec1 = Coffee, rice, yucca, cocoa, tobacco, cebu cattle. | blank2_name_sec1 = Poverty rate | blank2_info_sec1 = 62.4% | blank3_name_sec1 = Percentage of Peru's GDP | blank3_info_sec1 = 1.85% }} San Martín is a region in northern Peru. Most of the region is in the upper part of the Peruvian Amazon rainforest. Its capital is Moyobamba and the largest city in the region is Tarapoto. == Other websites == *
title: San Martín Region
